docs.snippet: He was one of the most beloved teachers in the small world of international schools that serve the children of diplomats, well-off American expatriates and local elites. He was often the first to arrive in the morning, and the last to leave each d...
docs.lead_paragraph: He was one of the most beloved teachers in the small world of international schools that serve the children of diplomats, well-off American expatriates and local elites. He was often the first to arrive in the morning, and the last to leave each day. He led students on class trips to exotic places, treating them to cookies and milk at bedtime.

headline.main: Pedophile Teacher Abused Scores as Clues Missed
headline.print_headline: Pedophile Teacher Abused Scores as Clues Missed

docs.snippet: Ras Baraka and Shavar Jeffries are busy casting aspersions on each other as they compete to lead a city with an assortment of troubles....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ras Baraka and Shavar Jeffries are busy casting aspersions on each other as they compete to lead a city with an assortment of troubles.
docs.abstract: Michael Powell Gotham column holds that mayoral race in Newark has a brutal aspect to it; asserts that both Ras Baraka and Shavar Jeffries are intelligent, early-middle-age men exchanging windmill punches and uppercuts; contends that their campaign styles fit the stakes of bruised and limping city.

headline.main: As Newark Fights Many Woes, Mayoral Candidates Take Jabs at Each Other
headline.print_headline: As Newark Fights Many Woes, Mayoral Candidates Take Jabs at Each Other

docs.snippet: The police said that the attacker had been trying to rob Wen Hui Ruan; several people walked by his crumpled form before a woman knelt down beside him....
docs.lead_paragraph: The police said that the attacker had been trying to rob Wen Hui Ruan; several people walked by his crumpled form before a woman knelt down beside him.
docs.abstract: Family members of retired garment factory worker Wen Hui Ruan gather to mourn on sidewalk near where he was beaten in East Village during a robbery attempt; he later died from his injuries; security video of attack shows several people passing by Ruan's crumpled body before anyone came to his aid; police have identified and are looking for suspect.

headline.main: Family Mourns at Site of a Fatal Beating
headline.print_headline: Family Mourns at Site of a Fatal Beating
